mapper.sql: id, parent_id, name, path, component, perms, type, icon, sort, visible, status, created_at, updated_at
mapper.select: SELECT FROM sys_menu WHERE status = 1 ORDER BY sort ASC, id ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_menu (parent_id, name, path, component, perms, type, icon, sort, visible, status) VALUES (#{parentId}, #{name}, #{path}, #{component}, #{perms}, #{type}, #{icon}, #{sort}, #{visible}, #{status})
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_menu SET parent_id = #{parentId}, name = #{name}, path = #{path}, component = #{component}, perms = #{perms}, type = #{type}, icon = #{icon}, sort = #{sort}, visible = #{visible}, status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT m.* FROM sys_menu m INNER JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON m.id = rm.menu_id WHERE rm.role_id = #{roleId} AND m.status = 1 ORDER BY m.sort ASC, m.id ASC

SELECT DISTINCT m.* FROM sys_menu m INNER JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON m.id = rm.menu_id INNER JOIN sys_user_role ur ON rm.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND m.status = 1 ORDER BY m.sort ASC, m.id ASC
